task.en: I don't know how to import footages to iMovie. Please help me import all images under `Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Separated_images/png` to directly under the project.
task.zh: 我不知道怎么把素材导入到iMovie中。请帮我把`Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Separated_images/png`路径下面的所有图片导入到project中，这些图片将直接位于项目素材库的根目录下。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/ && osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "f" using {control down, command down}'
grading_command: [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion Images/Original Media/000000.png" ] && [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion Images/Original Media/000001.png" ] && [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion Images/Original Media/000002.png" ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion\ Images/Original\ Media -type f -name "*.png" | wc -l) -ge 2 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion\ Images/Original\ Media -type f -name "*.png" | wc -l) -ge 1 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion\ Images/Original\ Media/png -type f -name "*.png" | wc -l) -ge 3 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion\ Images/Original\ Media/png -type f -name "*.png" | wc -l) -ge 2 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Diffusion\ Images/Original\ Media/png -type f -name "*.png" | wc -l) -ge 1 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
